attributes.action: Create a body to regulate spending of Ethical taxs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the government Tax your car and such for pollution this helps incourage you to be greener. However don't you want to make sure your money is being put to good use relative to such Ethical issues being dealt with or at least a fair percentage of it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
